00015 MavenFunction::MavenFunction() {
00016         returnType = "";
00017         name = "";
00018         descArgs = "";
00019         atLine = 0;
00020         isPublic = false;
00021         isStatic = false;
00022         isExternal = false;
00023         alias = "";
00024         alias_system = false;
00025         isExported = false;
00026         isInherited = false;
00027         isOverride = false;
00028 }
00029 
00030 string MavenFunction::getCPPLine(MavenCompiler* c, string className, bool isVirtual) {
00031         string r = " ";
00032         if(isVirtual) r += "virtual ";
00033         if(returnType != "<constructor>")
00034                 r += cType(findObjectPath(c, returnType, true)) + " ";
00035         r += className + "::" + name + "(";
00036         
00037         // function arguments can't be static
00038         for(int i = 0; i < args.length(); ++i)
00039                 args[i].isStatic = false;
00040         
00041         r += args.getCPP(c);
00042         r += ")";
00043         return r;
00044 }
00045 
00046 string MavenFunction::getSignature() {
00047         string s = "";
00048         for(int l = 0; l < args.length(); ++l) {
00049                 if(l) s += ",";
00050                 s += args[l].type;
00051         }
00052         return s;
00053 }
00054 
00055 string MavenFunction::getAnchorID() {
00056         string s = name + "(";
00057         for(int l = 0; l < args.length(); ++l) {
00058                 if(l) s += ",";
00059                 s += args[l].type;
00060         }
00061         return s + ")";
00062 }

00064 void MavenFunction::print() {
00065         cout << "returnType: " << returnType << endl;
00066         cout << "name: " << name << endl;
00067         cout << "descArgs: " << descArgs << endl;
00068         cout << "atLine: " << atLine << endl;
00069         cout << "isPublic: " << boolOnOff(isPublic) << endl;
00070         cout << "isStatic: " << boolOnOff(isStatic) << endl;
00071         cout << "isExternal: " << boolOnOff(isExternal) << endl;
00072         cout << "alias: " << alias << endl;
00073         cout << "alias_system: " << boolOnOff(alias_system) << endl;
00074         cout << "isExported: " << boolOnOff(isExported) << endl;
00075         cout << "isInherited: " << boolOnOff(isInherited) << endl;
00076         cout << "isOverride: " << boolOnOff(isOverride) << endl;
00077 }
